i m a hopeless romantic.

I'm not rich, but I'm content with my life and I love spending time with my dog.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a bit tired from a long day of knitting. I'm having a cup of chai tea to relax.
Hi there, I'm a bit tired from a long day of cooking. I'm having a cup of coffee to relax.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook Italian food. My family loves it when I cook for them.
That sounds delicious! I love Italian food too. I'm a big fan of pasta.
Me too! I love making pasta dishes. I'm actually making spaghetti right now.
Yum! I love spaghetti. What kind of sauce are you making?
I'm making a marinara sauce. It's one of my favorites.
That sounds amazing! I love marinara sauce. I'm going to have to make some soon.
You should! It's easy to make and it's so delicious.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
